text: wadhkur -'ayaha alrasula- 'iidh 'akhadh allah subhanah aleahd almuakid ealaa jmye al'anbia'a: layin ataytukum min kitab wahikmatin, thuma ja'akum rasul min eindi, musadiq lima maeakum latuminuna bih wltnsrnnah. fahal 'aqrartum waetaraftum bdhlk wa'akhadhtum ealaa dhlk eahdi almuthiqa? qaluu: 'aqrarna bidhalika, qalan: flyshhd baedukum ealaa buedan, wa'ashhiduu ealaa 'umimkum bidhalika, wa'ana maeakum min alshaahidin ealaykum waealayhim. wafi hdha 'ana allah 'akhadh almithaq ealaa kli nabiin 'ana yumin bimuhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalman, wa'akhadh almithaq ealaa 'umam al'anbia' bidhulka
